class_notes: The basic internship course provides students with an opportunity to earn 1 to 4 hours of S/U academic credit while gaining practical workplace experience. Unlike the advanced internship course (POLS 496RW), this course has no prerequisites. May be repeated up to a total of 8 credit hours.
